        ((nhds) x₀) (ae_strongly_measurable (F x) (μ.restrict ((exprΙ) a b))))
    (hF_int : interval_integrable (F x₀) μ a b) (hF'_meas : ae_strongly_measurable (F' x₀) (μ.restrict ((exprΙ) a b)))
    (h_bound :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ

        (t ∈ (exprΙ) a b → ∀ x ∈ ball x₀ ε, has_fderiv_at (fun x => F x t) (F' x t) x)) :

          a b (F x t) μ)
      («expr∫ in .. , ∂ » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∫ in .. , ∂ »" a
        b (F' x₀ t) μ)
      x₀ :=

    (h_lip :

        (fun x =>
          «expr∫ in .. , ∂ »
